text: The rufous-bellied thrush (Turdus rufiventris) is a songbird of the thrush family. It is found all over eastern South America. The bird is named after the color of its underparts. It is a common species of thrush within Brazil. It is the state bird of SÃ£o Paulo, and is the national bird of Brazil since 2002. == References == Category:Birds of South America Category:Thrushes
title: Rufous-bellied thrush
